channel.title: CVE Feed for dFactory -- Responsive Lightbox & Gallery

item.title: CVE-2023-49174|2024-08-02T21:53:43.289Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox%20%26%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox & Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox & Gallery: from n/a through 2.4.5.
